GSD.description:
xen/console: harden hvc_xen against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.11 by commit 153d1ea3272209fc970116f09051002d14422cde. For more details please see the references link.
